thread.title: ​Bach Society gets in tune with ‘American Masters’
thread.title_full: ​Bach Society gets in tune with ‘American Masters’ | www.daytondailynews.com

author: Russell Florence Jr.
title: ​Bach Society gets in tune with ‘American Masters’
text:
The distinctive works of American composers will be saluted next Sunday, Oct. 25, when the Bach Society of Dayton opens its season with “Salute to the American Masters” at Kettering Adventist Church under the music direction of John Neely with accompaniment by R. Alan Kimbrough.
“Everyone has their favorite composers so we tried to sift through material to find pieces that would provide a varied program,” Neely said. “We want to provide something for everybody.”
Continue reading on MyDaytonDailyNews.com. »
